ing: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
des: "Always a crowd pleaser and so easy to make.  This recipe can be as hot or as mild as you like, depending on which kind of tomatoes you buy.  I got this recipe from a friend. Serve with tortilla chips."
ins:
In a large skillet, cook sausage over a medium heat until it is browned and cooked through.
Mix tomatoes and cream cheese into the skillet. Stir and continue cooking the mixture over a medium heat until the cheese has melted.
